title: Brydgeâ€™s Stone Pro TB4 12-port docking station is now available to buy
content:
Brydge has announced that its latest Thunderbolt docking station, the Brydge Stone Pro TB4, is available to buy starting today. This dock gives you a total of 12 ports (though that includes the host connection port) so you can connect a wide range of peripherals to your laptop or desktop PC. It also has a

The post Brydge’s Stone Pro TB4 12-port docking station is now available to buy appeared first on XDA.
description: Brydge has announced that its first Thunderbolt 4 dock, the Stone pro TB4, is now available to buy. It costs $329 and gives you 11 ports.
